titleStmt.title: Description of University of Pennsylvania Museum of Archaeology and Anthropology, e16510: Hebrew prayer with phrases from Psalms and Legal Document

publicationStmt.publisher: University of Pennsylvania Museum of Archaeology and Anthropology

notesStmt.note: Recto contains Hebrew prayer; verso, a legal document. Lower part of recto contains signatures unevenly cut away. Not yet fully catalogued. Metadata based on image and Advanced Papyrological Information System (APIS) data. Title based on Prof. Robert A. Kraft's 1990 survey of University Museum Hebrew Manuscripts.Damaged by holes. Most of left margin torn away. Upper and lower thirds mostly missing.

msIdentifier.repository: University of Pennsylvania Museum of Archaeology and Anthropology

msItem.title: Hebrew prayer with phrases from Psalms and Legal Document

history.provenance: University of Pennsylvania Museum, Ellen W. Harrison Collection. Purchased from Prof. Moritz of Cairo through W.M. Muller, 1910.
